explanation: Tricky one! CHANGE with HANG out is CE. Time is T. A two-letter note could be FA. FA+CE+T = FACET, meaning "side".
hints: Time can be replaced with a T.
"-out" is being used as a deletion indicator.
What letters can we get from "change hang-out"?
"Note" often refers to a musical note. This could be A through G, or it could be solf√®ge. (Do Re Mi etc...)
The definition is "side", as in a plane (perhaps of something that has many sides).
